task.title: Task Analysis of How Request Courses
task.shortdesc: These steps with help users navigate Hokie Spa so that they can efficiently request their courses for the upcoming semester

context.p: Complete these steps to complete course request

steps.step:
Log into Hokie Spa
Go to Degree Audit Menu

Run DARS report
Check unfulfilled areas and requirements

Go to Timetable
Look up courses
Organize courses into desirable schedule
Write down CRNs
Go to Hokie Spa main page
Input CRNs in order of importance
